definition: Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: Even with the hefty fees, the organization says it plans only to break even.
sentences.chinese: 即使收费如此巨大，机构称它才刚刚保本。

sentences.english: The breakeven point analysis is kernel content of the cost volume profit model.
sentences.chinese: 保本点分析是量本利分析的核心内容。

sentences.english: The principal protection feature is only applicable if this product is held to maturity.
sentences.chinese: 保本特点仅于持有本产品至到期时方适用。

definition: certificate of deposit/time deposit/abbr. for 定期存款|定期存款[ding4 qi1 cun2 kuan3]
stop-loss point, a point at which you make a small loss to limit your losses
to lose everything one invested (idiom)/to lose one's shirt
